name: The haunting of paper doll house
name_original: The haunting of paper doll house
description:
In development. Submission for the jam "Game Off 2022".

Please feel free to drop any feedback on the gameplay or anything really, all feedback is very very very welcomed!

Protagonist is stuck in a doll house, in a paper-made doll house, haunted paper doll house :)

Controls:

  • Move - Arrows
  • To interact with objects protagonist should be in a close proximity, then object shows UI if it is interactable. 
  • Camera View can be controlled with the mouse

Sounds from Unity asset store

Game logic and all Assets are created from scratch for this jam.  

Tools: Unity, Paint

Team size: 1
